thread.title: MovieNews | We're hosting a FREE screening of Scream at Sugar Club, Dublin
thread.title_full: MovieNews | We're hosting a FREE screening of Scream at Sugar Club, Dublin - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: MovieNews | We're hosting a FREE screening of Scream at Sugar Club, Dublin
text:
Do you like scary movies?
On Monday, October 26th, we're hosting a screening of the 1996 horror classic Scream at Sugar Club on Leeson St., Dublin. And the best part? It's all totally free.
There's a limited number of seats and tickets available, so you'd better move fast if you want to watch Scream with us.
What's more, we'll be recording The Insider Podcast live before the show where we'll be talking about the life and career of Wes Craven, who sadly passed away some time ago. The podcast will be recorded in front of the live audience before the film starts and will be streamed via YouTube, iTunes and Soundcloud.
In order to get along, all you've gotta do is follow the link to book your tickets and we'll see you at The Sugar Club on Bank Holiday Monday, October 26th at 7.30PM!
